Package XXLChess

Class AnimationVehicle

java.lang.Object
XXLChess.AnimationVehicle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Tickable
public class AnimationVehicle extends Object implements Tickable
This class represents the movement animation of a chess piece. It calculates and updates the position of the piece frame by frame, creating a moving effect.

  • Constructor Details

    • AnimationVehicle

      public AnimationVehicle(int pieceMovementSpeed, int maxMovementTime, Movement m)
      Constructor for the AnimationVehicle class.
      Parameters:
      pieceMovementSpeed - The speed at which the piece should move.
      maxMovementTime - The maximum time the movement should take.
      m - The move that the piece is making.

    • getAfterimage

      public processing.core.PImage getAfterimage()
      Get the image of the piece at the target tile.
      Returns:
      The image of the piece at the target tile, or null if the target tile is empty.

    • tick

      public void tick()
      Update the position of the piece. If the movement has ended, this method throws an IllegalStateException.
      Specified by:
      tick in interface Tickable

      Check if the movement has ended.
      Specified by:

      Returns:
